name: Ring of The Phoenix
description:
An adventurer has spent years trying to find the fabled ring of the phoenix and after all his efforts has finally found it. The ring is said to allow the wearer to cheat death through rebirth, however when putting on the ring, the adventurer is thrust into yet another dungeon. This time he must make use of his past lives in order to escape and prove he is worthy of the ring!

Web GL version was completed post game jam but is the same game version as the game jam submission. Added a line of code to make it full screen on browser. Feel free to play either version to get your impression!
